author: cms-sw
body:
- Short status of test now includes the package name too e.g.
```
Pass    0s ... x/y/test1
Pass   11s ... x/y/test2
Skip    0s ... x/y/skip_me
Pass   41s ... x/y/test3
Pass   61s ... x/y/test4
```

- Remove extra package level messages during unit tests
title: improved unit test message
